content.detailedDescription:
So as usual i was star-gazing (and watching for any "strange lights") from my front patio. as i moved my eyes over towards the santa cruz mountains i noticed a very bright orb which was pretty much stationary except it kinda moved left and right a little. during this time, there were a few planes flying by it, but maybe a mile distance away. now the way these planes were moving by it was from north to south. i'd like to also add that this is not a normal flight path, and the only time planes or choppers fly in this area is during any strange light activity. when the planes did fly nearby (it was a total of three), the "orb" would get even brighter then dim down just a bit after they passed. 

i remembered to get my camera out to try to get some photos this time. i zoomed in as much as possible and took about 15 photos. when i reviewed them, most came out looking like a galaxy of rainbow colors from the movement it was making, but in two, you can make out the shape of a triangle. after i took the photos, i went to the computer to upload them which took about 5-7 minutes. meanwhile i kept checking back every few minutes to see if it was still present. at 2320 hours, i went back out to check again, and it was completely gone. 

next week i should get my telescope back from the shop, and will be able to see things better, and will be able to take pics through my tele. i have noticed a pattern though. these "lights/orbs" seem to hover in one area for a 2-3 day span at the same time every night, then move onto another area and do the same. maybe they are scoping out areas for something. this event last night was not too far from the cupertino quarry. maybe 3 miles away. there is so much activity in this area, and i wonder if there is some mineral or something they are after.
content.summary: Pictures of possible triangle

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, 2-1/2 year old daughter, and i were in our driveway washing our dog around 7pm local time on mother's day. my daughter gets excited about birds and airplanes in the sky, so when we were looking at a passing commercial jetliner in a nearly cloudless sky i noticed an object considerably higher up in the atmosphere than what an airplane would fly. the object was visible to the naked eye as a brightly shimmering sphere, and appeared just to the east of our house. it was traveling at a rate of speed that was much slower than what a commercial airplane would travel, but faster than what a satellite would travel as it orbits the earth. in fact, a crescent moon was present just to the west of the house, giving me a point of reference to determine if what i was seeing was a satellite orbiting the earth, or if it was something else. typically, satellites do not have self-propulsion and cannot slow to a stop, as this object did. 

i asked my wife to look at the object with me and she was able to locate it in the sky easily. it was traveling quite slowly and, after watching it for about 10 or 15 minutes, it ultimately stopped and hovered almost directly overhead. we were both excited about seeing the object, but i wanted a closer look. i asked my wife to retrieve our binoculars so that we could try and get a better look at the object. with the binoculars we both were able to determine that the object was no airplane, and that it was not a satellite. i could not determine whether the silvery-white light emitting from the object was a reflection of the sun shining on it, or if it was coming from the object itself. because of its brightness, i believe it was emitting its own light. in order to get a better look at the object through the binoculars i sat in a lounge chair and rested my head on it. this helped to "steady" the binoculars to get a better look.

the object appeared to change shapes and/or split into as many as three separate objects, each with its own light. it pulsed, expanded, and contracted as it changed shape and split. after splitting it quickly reformed back into one object. there seemed to be no pattern as it split into two or three separate objects and then reformed back into one. i watched the object(s) for almost one hour. 

at around 8pm a young couple had come to our house to meet our dog (we are looking for someone to adopt her, as we are moving out of state soon), and i lost sight of the ufo. approximately 30 minutes later the couple had left and i tried to locate the ufo again. unfortunately, clouds began to roll in from the west and i was unable to locate it.
content.summary: Shape-shifting ufo hovers over northern dallas

content.detailedDescription: I was gong to lock my car up for the ight that was parked in the road. i got to the end of my driveway and looked a the night sky( i love looking at the stars).I looked up and saw what looked like a shooting star, so i paused to look, but i realized it wasnt because it didnt burn up like one. and on the leading tip was a rapid flashing light.I couldnt look away or move. it had to be super far up in the sky and it was traveling at a very fast speed. it travelled the whole night sky in atleast 5 seconds. much faster than a plane. its tail end looked like a shooting star, but i t couldnt have been because it was flashing. then it disapered as fast as it came.
content.summary: Looked like a shooting star but was led by flashing light

content.detailedDescription: Approx 2 months ago i witnessed 2 military helicopters chasing a ball of fire at about 1500 ft above my house approx 11 pm,the ball was leaving a contrail of somesort and no noise only choppers noise.And last week i spotted the orange ball at a altitude of 10-15 thousand feet(being a pilot i know what color anti collision lights are supposed to be from one direction to another) so i was wondering why no red or green,white strobes were blinking.As i watched it for a few moments tear drop like flames would drip from the bottom 3 xs in a row 3-4 times, i called my friend/roomate out to the deck and he caught the last 3 drips before it disapeared completely for 10 seconds then appeared for another 5 seconds and went very dull colored orange before diapearing while traveling west to east approx 500-700 mph.Well last night the orange ball appeared agian doing the same show traveling west to east again at approx 7-10 thousand feet, i yelled to my friend again and he came flying out the door and was able to catch it dripping orange as it turned and started coming towards my place when it orbed off and on maybe 2-4 times before it went above the clouds and lost it.I live on a hill in a rural area that looks towards corona and thats where it seems to start or atleast where i always first see it.I hope for another show, camera is ready this time.Will let you know.
content.summary: Orange glowing ball moving across sky dropping like drips of fire that look like tears

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting at my post as a security guard when i noticed up in the sky was a true blue light with one red one. i knew it was differant when i had been used to seeing red lights with turquase [our stuff].So i got up and began following, i saw a tray in the sky, it was scudding under the clouds, it had a t-like design on the underside,it's a dark color and the craft or ship was light in color.
     afterwards i was relunctant to report it fearing i would be designated insane and or spirited away to some hidden location. a month passed and i got the nerve to talk to someone i worked with, she suggested i tell mufon. another month went by and i worked up enough nerve to report and i did.                                                                            within months i got a call from one of your investigators on my voicemail and lost the call. now it's been three years now, i report again and i hope i don't lose the call again.
content.summary: Traylike,flying west to east, slight banking, turns southeast and flies east

content.detailedDescription: I was out doing some yard work in the back last night while i was walking to the front of the yard i happened to look up about what i would say is about maybe 500 to 800 feet up was a black sphere flying by in a straight line going west bound. the weather condition was windy i thought it might be bird at first but it was close enough that naked eye could make out it shape, no wings then i thought it was a ballon becasue of its shape but balloons dont fly in a straight line. i watched it for about 20 to 45 seconds before it disappered into the horizon. it was very quick moving about the air.
content.summary: Black sphere

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the food world parking lot at northcross shopping center.  i was watching the moonset because it was a deep oranve crescent moon and very big on the  wnw horizon.  i noticed a very bright star to  the left of the moon.  it was a little higher on the horizon and less nw than the moon. i thought it was venus or something. it was still and didn't blink, shrink,or grow in appearance or brightness. after about 6 minutes it started blinking and moving north.  it crossed over the moon ( or appeared to from my viewpoint)  and slowly went northwest to north. after it started moving, i noticed the blinking lights.  blue-white looking. hardly noticeable. i watched it for a few, and wondered if it was a plane, ho could it be so still for so long?  it's not a helicopter.  i know those. i know what their lights look like.   it could be man-made, but i don't know what it was.

i didn't feel anything special.  no excitement, nothing.  i honestly don't remember how i lost sight of the object.  i was looking at it moving, then my memory is blank on whether it went behind  the horizon or trees or blinked out.  seriously.  i was tired, waiting for a friend to come out of the store and aching all over.  i was more excited about the moon being so dark orange-reddish brown as it was setting.  the light was just something i observed while watching the moon set.
content.summary: Bright star-like object.  stationary for  over 5 minutes then slowly went north.

content.detailedDescription:
1: i was on my deck filming light orbs in the sky overhead with my night vision/laptop.

2: a flash out of the corner of my eye..

3: a triangular ufo/delta craft but its 3 small ones in my opinion.

4: it flew out of the western sky on a north eastern flight path. the objects seemed to get brighter for a few seconds..

5: my feelings where woah never seen 3 in formation before.. 

6: i lost sight behind a tree but my gazeebo is right in the way too you see it in the video..
content.summary: 3 ufo's in formation

content.detailedDescription:
I'm reporting this for my adult niece who is a little too freaked out.  i typed her story as she told it to me:

i was sitting in the living room engrossed in an online chat with my brother.  it was nearly dark outside, the front door faces north.  out of the corner of my eye, i saw piercing white and red lights shining brightly through the small windows at the top of the door.  they were very bright like police lights, very piercing bright red and white lights. at first i thought it was some kind of emergency vehicle.  i went to the door and on tip toes peeked out the little windows at the top of the door. i saw white and red lights all in a row and on a slant passing above the house.  

i ran into the kitchen window (faces south) and that's when i got a really good look.  it looked like it was moving really slowly, but it probably looked slower than it really was, from it's altitude i might guess it was moving 40mph, but i really can't say for sure.  i do know i had time to run from the front to the back of a small house (2 rooms) and had to wait about 30 second for it to appear above the house in the back.  i called my cousin downstairs and she saw it too.  

it was a football-like shaped ufo about the size of a car with a very thin lip around the edge that had the lights on it.  there were one or two bright white lights on each end and a bright red light in the middle.  the white lights on the ends were thinner but longer, which is why i think there may have been two together on the ends.  the red light in the middle was much larger, shorter but fatter, like doubled up.  i couldn't tell what color the object was, but i didn't see any kind of shiny surface reflecting light.  

i would say it was about 150 feet above the house, it was far too close to be a plane or helicopter and there was absolutely no sound and no wind from it.  it paused for about 30 to 60 seconds in the sky in a clearing between some trees over the street behind mine (which is lower, i can see over those rooftops), then it moved eastward behind the trees. then a second ufo just like it suddenly appeared in the clearing where the first was seconds before, and it moved off to the south in a very similar fashion to the first one.  

my blood pressure started to rise and i started to sweat and feel really hot, even though i wasn't afraid of it, per se.  my heart was racing, i guess from adrenaline.  i called my aunt and mom who live less than 2 miles from here.  they couldn't see it from their house, so they raced over within 5 minutes, talking to me on the phone the whole way, but the objects had disappeared behind trees by the time they got there and they didn't see them.  

end of my niece's story. i'm the aunt she called and i will tell you that she was extremely tense when she called us, so we kept her on the phone while we raced over as fast as we could.  she was describing in very anxious tones exactly what she was seeing while it was happening begging us to please hurry!  unfortunately, it was gone by the time we got there not 5 minutes later, but i believe my niece.  she doesn't know anything about ufos, stuff like this never even crosses her mind.  she was afraid we would think she was making it up, but i could tell by the anxiety in her voice this was all very real, plus she had a second witness in her cousin who also lives in the house.  

this sighting occurred over cheviot, ohio which borders the west side of the city of cincinnati proper and is a very populated area with lots of houses and street lights.

i had her sketch a picture of what she saw immediately after she told us about it.  unfortunately i'm unable to scan it tonight, but i'll keep it and hopefully can add it to this report later.
in the meantime, she went online to look for things that were similar.  she said the lights looked a lot like this ufo oregon shot, only without the one light on the top.
and she said it was similar in shape to the trinidad shot, only the lip that circumvents it was much less pronounced, and held the lights.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Football shaped ufo flew silently over house, joined by a 2nd one

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving along our country road on the way to work, when i caught sight of this strange, bright object in the sky ahead of me. i knew that it was not a star, it was too large, and in the wrong position for a star. it was a bright, sunny day, not a cloud in the sky, with lots of daylight left in the horizon. i watched this thing very intently, and observed its behaviour closely. it first appeared as a very large, bright obect, but, as i watched it further, i saw it suddenly change to an orange colour, similar to a incandescent light bulb being turned off, and seeing the filament glowing orange.

when it changed to orange, it revealed its shape as a large, cylinder-shaped object (ship), with flat ends, and it was hanging motionless in the sky at a 45 degree angle, with its right end pointing downward, and slightly rotated towards me, so that i could see that the end was flat, and elliptical, indicating that the main body of the ship was a round cylinder. 

i marvelled at this thing, realizing that indeed it must be a ufo, and i was just so amazed at this possibility! then i saw it flash, in rapid succession, twice, and as i rounded a corner in the road, i lost sight of the thing behind the trees. but, it only took around 2 minutes to get past the corner, and on to another straight stretch of the road, and into a clearing where i could once more get a clear and a panoramic view of the sky. i knew exactly where to look up to find the object once again, but to my surprise, it was completely gone! i looked everywhere that i could, but there was no trace of it to be seen!      

i could hardly believe what i had just seen-a real ufo! i later asked around town, to see if anyone else had seen anything unusual in the sky, but to no avail, so i kept it to myself, except for telling family and close friends. however, i recorded the details of my sighting for my own experience, and sat on the information until finally deciding to report it to a legitimate ufo tracking agency.
content.summary: Caught sight of object in sky while driving. appeared as very bright star at first, then turned orange, flashed two times, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Orange lighted glowing, t-shaped objects appeared from the western sky and moved with no clear path to the northeast as they disappeared from sight. they did not move in a straight line rather slowly darting in an apparent path to the northeast.  these nine objects caught both my eye and that of my wife, esther.  they did not appear all at once, more like one or two at a time.  they had a weird orange glow.  they were not planes, large or small.  they could have been helicopters but i don't think so.  helicopters that i have observed in the past did not move or have the appearance that these objects had.  this observance lasted no more than ten minutes.  it was an odd experience which has left a question mark in my thoughts as well as that of my wife.
content.summary: Orange lights, t-shaped objects appeared from the western sky

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my bikecycle on green bay road north in kenosha wis. i was about 100 meters or 75 meters from highway 50 which ran east an west.  the ufo was headed east towards the lake michagan, traveling just above little clouds, it was just befor dark sun was setting and cloudy it just stopped about 300 feet in the air i pointed at it so people in their cars would stop to see what i seen.  next i just drop my bike and ran under some trees near a house.  the ufo just went east quickly an quitly  after i started running under the trees. in june 18 or 19 of 1978 .
content.summary: Disk shape dark color camo

content.detailedDescription:
En el momento de este avistamiento estaba conversando con mi hermano y un amigo de la familia en el antejardin de mi casa que quedaba al frente del parque principal del barrio quintaparedes en la ciudad de bogot���, depronto medio por mirar hacia los cerrros de monserrate y guadalupe que son los cerros tutelares de la ciudad asi los llaman, y entre estas dos monta���as apericio un punto oscuro en el cielo totalmente despejado ese dia que tenia trayectoria en linea recta hacia donde estabamos nosotros conversando, lo que en ese momento me parecio un avion cambia a sorpresa ya que este objeto desaparecio en un punto del cielo y aparecio luego en un punto del cielo mas adelante de donde habia desaparecido pero siguiendo la mismo trayectoria de linea recta el el cielo, al ver esto alerte a mi hermano y mi amigo sobre lo que estaba viendo y asi siguio este objeto su desplazamiento agran velocidad muchas personas que estaban en se momento tanto en el parque como en la calle tambien presenciaron este objeto provocando asombro, sorpresa y curiosidad. este objeto cruzo el cielo bogotano en por lo menos 2 minutos y medio, no emitio sonido alguno ni dejo estela alguna en el cielo ademas de estar a gran altura y lo que mas provoco asombro fue que desaparecia en un punto y aparecia en otro punto en el cielo, otra cosa emitia luces de color naranja en la parte visible que mostraba este objeto o que podiamos ver, el obleto desaparecio por encima de las casas con direccion al noroccidente de la ciudad,  esto es lo que les puedo comentar al respecto de esto que nunca olvidare.

1.Estaba conversando en con mi hermano y un amigo en el antejardin de mi casa.
2. me quede mirando haber que era cundo me di cuenta de que era algo extra���o por que desaparecia en un punto del cielo y aparecia en otra punto del cielo.
3. crei que era un avion de combate por lo veloz que se desplazaba en el cielo pero esta a mucha altura en el mismo.
4. se mivia en el cielo en linea recta nunca cambia de direccion.
5. sorpresa en un momento y luego asombro cuando este objeto desaparecia en un punto del cielo y aparecia mas adelante en otro punto del cielo a una velocidad que avion alguno en esos tiempos pudiera igualar.
6. se perdio de mi vista cuando desaparecio por encima del techo de mi casa, mi hermano y mi amigo si lo siguieron viendo ya que de fueron alfondo de calle haste que lo perdieron de vista yo no pude hacer eso porque me muevo en silla de ruedas.
content.summary: Ovni triangular oscuro, trayectoria en linea recta, sin sonido alguno desaparecia y aparecia de un punto en el cielo y a otro punto en el cielo, el cielo totalmente despejado en ese dia visibilidad optima.

content.detailedDescription:
My home is near to izmir-ataturk airport (izmir/turkey) about 45 km. i can see very clearly to airplanes which come down to the airport at nights. i observed many ufos since 1993 in my city especially many ones in a vlillage out of the city, but i succeed to record this video over city centre.

when i was surfing on the internet in my room, i needed to get fresh air from my balcony. i just look around the sky , i saw the blue object in the sky the rotation of 2 o'clock. ���t was very slow like an helicopter, firt of all i was think it could be helicopter. ���t was easyly and slowly flowing to the behind my apartment. when it came top of me i realised there is no signal lamps, no wings,no voice, i got my handy-cam which is 40 optical zoom and i run from the balcony to the front door of the apartment. and i succeed to record this video.

when the object moved the next street , i was run to the main road and some peaople gathered around me that what i am recording. we stated to talk and i was trying to get clear view which the object behind the coulds. suddenly it appeeard few ones more and they are opened and closed the blue lights few times supposing they were known that we see them. few people are saw those lights with me. that happen 1 or 2 minute like signal.And they disappeared inside the clouds. 

when i saw the object i feel an exite,���t was very clear for me that was not a known flying soucer, baloon or human made. after the record when i watched in my pc i suprised the object is very speedy manipulated from 1.07 second to 1.14 second according to which i marked refference point electricity lines on the street.
content.summary: Blue flourescent colour, very slow moving and standing, suddenly manipulated different directions, like egg shape

content.detailedDescription: I think that you guys should check my area i don't want to say but i think you might see something.
content.summary: Not sure

content.detailedDescription: Estaba en mi casa observando el cielo tan claro que habia,soy aficionado a la fotografia y se me ocurrio fotografiar el sol.Cogi mi nikon y ize varias tomas del sol.A simple vista no se apreciaba nada anormal,pero cuando pase las fotos al pc y fui ampliando la foto vi que alrededor del sol habia multiples objetos esfericos,y en cada toma variaban el numero de objetos asi como sus posiciones,lo se por que al ver la primera foto me quede perplejo y ante la duda de cualquier posible error de la camara volvi rapidamente a repetir la toma ,mi asombro fue que los objetos seguian saliendo,variaban de posicion y en numero.A simple vista no se veian, mas que nada por que al estar alrededor del sol no se podian observar.Mis sentimientos sobre lo que he visto me hacen ser cauto al ser mi primera experiencia,pero reconozco mi curiosidad por saber que eran esos objetos.Os envio dos fotografias.La primera es la original,en al cual segun se va ampliando se pueden observar los objetos alrededor del sol.La segunda es la misma pero retocada con photoshop,asi consegui un espectaculo digno de debatir.Gracias desde espa������a.Saludos.
content.summary: Multiples objetos esfericos entorno al sol.

content.detailedDescription:
...Because it has no brain.  the 5 photos i took was a different shape. yet in each shot on the film it was one same object.  dr. b. macabee analyzed them and authenticated them to be a moving object, not a hoax. i knew they were not yet understood since people do these things. in the photos they are saucer in shape with a field around it. though it has been many years past i did not report the second sighting of the same type ship. (seen others in different ships)
this one quite larger in size. did not have a camera but did have my dad with me who jokingly called me a nut. but not after this!
it was a mofon f.I. that came to my house. asked lots of questions. he could see i was being honest. though at least 3 times he asked me if i was sure i'd not read about ufos and had not.
then he gave me a book to read saying 'if at any time you start to feel upset, stop reading. it was upsetting yet found a relief because i now had an understanding of many things.  to this day, though i can not proove it, the worse is having (seemingly) a child taken from me while only a few weeks pregant. is female. called it me 'wise baby dream' until..
then saw her again when she was around 6/7 yrs old in earth years.  i call her my star-child yet wonder still... and always will.
do not know for sure but a few years ago woke up and by blue eyes had turned green as grass litteraly overnight.  not sure if it was them or not. not once have i asked mufon or did any type research. so now i am ready to know, if you would kindly tell me if this has happened to others.
when i last contacted mufon i needed time to integrate all i had learned. by rhe way my last name was revis at the time. 
no one ever contacted me once the photos i kindly gave permission to use at a mufon gathering.  am still at the same address.
thats basically it. to let tou know me and my dad saw one again...If there is such a thing as a mother ship it would be one. and curious if anyone else woke up with their eyes a different and intense color. (later turned back to my normal color. my mom was aghast! how could anyone know  how *i* feel? they are my eyes, after all!)
thank you for letting me share and vent a  bit and update too. please, i need help to know about what happened to my eyes.
sincerely,
*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Disquised as before but bigger.  like 'dots' or a huge hoard of insects. yet makes you 'think' what you see.  took photos of the first one.  mufon has them.

linda seay-skaggs (revis)

content.detailedDescription: I was out night hunting fox and rabits on a farm in tarpoley cheshire england, there was a lite wind and sum cloud in the sky it was warm the time was 1150pm. i had just set my self up under a big old oak tree to nail sum rabits, i put on my lamp it has a red filter as i did this a larg white light appered above me in the sky, i first thought it was a police helicoptor and it was checking me out, as this is quite a common thing to happen out here as people phone in and say they have seen a man with a gun and they are not happy i am sure you know what i mean, well this was not the police helicoptor that was checking me out. i turned off my lamp and it did the same so i turned mine back on and it did the same. i then came out from under the tree i put the beam of my lamp on the craft as i did this it let sum vapor like fog out from its light the craf was triangal in shape looked black in colour and larg it was approx 1500ft up, there was no noise coming from it. i then started to flash my lamp on and off at it and it did the same back , it then spirail up at a speed i can only say was like a flash and it was gone just like that. i was very overwelmed after the sighting as i new i had just had a encountor with somthing very special
content.summary: Large triangle one large light  in middle flashing no noise sum sort of vapor coming from it  approx 1500ft high

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work one night, i am in restaurant management, and while on i-49, i saw a light appear from the sky.  at first i thought it was a helicopter, but the light shined on my car and then it was just gone.  it didnt 'fly away', just disappeared.  whatever it was, hovered over my car from about 40 - 50 feet above me and it lasted just for a few seconds.
content.summary: Ufo while driving on i-49

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my patio with my husband right after i got home from work. i typically look in the night sky just on the off chance that i will see something. when the object first came into view i thought it was an airplane. airplane traffic is a pretty common thing in our area (not busy, but you see them enough). what i thought was odd though was the color and the way the light pulsated. it looked to be a little bit larger than an airplane with a bluish white light. it was traveling from north to south looking like it was heading towards the melbourne airport which is about 15-20 miles south of us. i kept watching it and it went no further than the tree line which is about a block behind our home and about 6 blocks long. my husband then started to take notice of what it was that i was looking at. the object then turned around and started making erratic circles looking like it was preparing to land. it then headed back towards the north making me think that it was never looking to land. when it started heading north it slowed down considerably and at one point hovered for about a minute or two. it then continued on its northward path and we never saw it after that as we remained on the patio till about eleven p.M. e.S.T. the thing i thought most interesting is that during the 15 minutes that we witnessed it there was no airplane traffic in the sky which is rare, seeing as how we'll see one about every 5 to ten minutes. we had an intense interest with what it was because it was so out of the ordinary.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange pulsating light

content.detailedDescription: It was feb 2nd 2011 right around 2 pm me and my girlfriend were hiking to the top of the highest point in saratoga at villa at montalvo arts center as we reached the top of the hiking trail we decided to take some pics of us with the amazing view behind us. i held the camera in my left hand and started to take some shots. the camera i was using was a nikon coolpix l110 brand new just got it for christmas 2010. i took 20 pics within 3-10secs due to my camera havin a option called quick shot it allows you to just hold down the shoot button and it will keep shaping shots in till you release the button. after that was done we hang out at the top of the trail for another 20 or so mins then started back down the hiking trail it was not till i got home to load my pics to my ipad i noticed something odd in one of the pics. we stayed at the top of the hiking trail for about 30 mins during that time we never heard a sound from any aircraft or saw anything in the sky.
content.summary: Ufo saratoga villa at montalvo arts center hiking trail

content.detailedDescription:
Looked up and saw a alien dressed in a black jump out fit, with a very big helmet.
by the time i looked at my mate and saw him looking at the alien as well,and turned my head back it had gone.
content.summary: Saw a alien looking at me and my mate,on a path

content.detailedDescription:
Note: this call was taken by missouri mufon on 5/9/2011, and written in the caller's exact words.  the caller is age 17. 

i was riding in the car with my mother late saturday night (sunday morning) near lee's summit road and 23rd street and looking out the window, when i saw a very bright green color object streak through the sky overhead. it had a long tail, and was headed from west to east. the tail dissappeared as fast at the object in front of it did. it looked like a round shape but i couldn't be sure because it moved so fast. it looked like it was lit up very brightly - kind of like a neon light.  it was going very fast, and was out of sight quickly - within 3 seconds. i couldn't believe how fast it was moving! it would take an asprin to cover the oject up (with out the tail included). i like looking at the planets with my telescope at night, so i look at the sky a lot and see a lot of planes and helicopters in the sky, but i've never seen anything like this.  i told my mom about it but by the time she looked it was gone.  she said i could call you about it but not give my phone number. it sure didn't look like a plane. i don't think it was anything man-made and i don't think it was a meteor, either. a green meteor? i don't think so. i hope someone else saw this so my mom and dad won't think i'm crazy.
content.summary: Bright green object streaked through the sky

content.detailedDescription: At first i thought it was the space station but then it curved to the southeast than began to weave side to side than faded out at about 45 degrees above the horizon.
content.summary: Traveled west to east  almost directly overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
I enjoy taking photos of the different phases of the moon. i do so on a regular basis, opportunity premitting.  i was off on thursday (05-05-11) and out in the yard w/dog around 20:??  i saw a nice photo op of the moon sliver 2nd day after new.  i went and grabbed my camera (fuji finepix s1000fd)and tripod.  i shoot in manual mode and as i'm a rookie amature, i start low with shutter speed and quick check the display and adjust accordingly.  

as for the event, i didn't really see it in full bloom until i transferred the photos to pc.  i took a series of about 20 pics.  since i can only send 3 files, i will focus on the first 5 pics taken.  the first 2 (#49 & 50, not incl) were overexposed (approx 6 sec. exp).  the next two, #51 & 52, are the shots of interest.  both shots are at 1 sec exposure (the moon shot value is lame as i was warming up, but...). i also include #53 as it taken within the same minute as 51 & 52 but shows nothing but the moon. 

on shot (#51), (set for a 1 sec exposure w/2 sec delay) i noticed a red spot on my screed display of my "moon shot".  as i didn't see it with my naked eye, i thought it was probably some "noise" so i refocused and took another shot (same settings)approx. 30 seconds later. this time i noticed 2 red dots (on the review screen) well below the area where i saw the first (in relation to the moon). 

i was kinda curious but didn't want to miss the photo op for the moon sliver so continued my shoot.  

about an hour later, i uploaded the pics to my pc and took a look.  after some magnification, i know what i think i see.  curious as to what you come up with.  



one of the suggestions here is to descibe how i feel during, after etc.;

i am an avid astronomer who sincerely  believes in other intelligent life somewhere out yonder but also believe that if "they" are smart enough they can see us, we won't see them.  gotta stay open minded though.  

i hope these pics have enough resoulution for you decipher something of value/interest and you have as much fun looking at them as i do.
content.summary: Photo coincidence-something (appears to be) traveling beyond moon orbit.

content.detailedDescription:
Upon backing out of driveway and pulling away slowly going west, i noticed an object with 4 steady lights and 1 blinking light in the center hovering over local water retention area. it caught my eye because it was stationary for a while. i stopped my car in the middle of the street and watched it, thinking i should get my camera phone out and see if i can capture it. object began travelling east/southeast. movement was instantaneous, it did not pitch and accelerate like a helicopter, it just started moving at constant speed. i turned my car around and followed it to the end of the block to get a better look and object was gone.

possibly misidentifed aircraft at odd angle, but highly unlikely because i watched it hover for a good 30 seconds and fumbled for my camera phone. it appeared "square" because of the lighting layout, inlike anything i have ever seen on an aircraft. all lights were brilliant white, no other colors were visible. i could not tell the size or distance but it has to have been within 1 mile, it looked to be hovering over the water retention area that is in my community. 

very unnerving sighting.
content.summary: Object with 4 lights at corners and blinking light in middle hovering for 30-40sec then headed ese

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i had decided that after dinner we would like to go stargazing in a pretty remote area near lake isabella. after arriving and laying on the car my girlfriend said she had never been stargazing before. after giving her a brief description of the way i usually go about it, she immediatly noticed that the star she was focused on was moving. i asked her to point it out to me with the flashlight. after she did i was amazed, the object was moving in a swimming like motion around a cluster of stars. it stopped and started, all throughout the time we watched it. it would make a circle and then stop, or make a swimming motion, then move to the left or right in a straight line. after about 30 minutes or so of watching it i came to the conclusion that it was in fact something i had never seen before while stargazing and began flashing it with a flashlight (which i believed would have no effect whatsoever). thats when things got a little more intense. we were still focused on the object in the sky, when a huge blue flash lit up the tree tops to our left, which shocked us. we were not 100% sure if the 2 events were related, but seemed enough like they were that we left right afterward. once we left neither of us could believe what we witnessed and were still a little freaked out from the flash of light. we got home safe with no further events.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Star-like ufo seen near lake isabella while stargazing.

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming home from work and saw this over i-470 in ohio as i came across the i-470 bridge from wv. i saw this and i carry a camera around with me most of the time. i pulled over and took these photos. there were a few others that pulled over also and was using cell phones to film it.

it was there for about 20 sec's and then took off to the north and out of site. funny part is that it was silent.
content.summary: Coming across bridge into ohio i saw this over the i-470, i stopped and took a photo
